Package hjz_zork

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Adventurer
    Class which implements the Character played by the player.
    Character
    Class which represents a character in the dungeon.
    Command
    Abstract class representing a player command to the Zork interpreter.
    CommandFactory
    Factory class which generates Command objects for the Zork interpreter.
    DropCommand
    Class representing a 'drop' command to the Zork interpreter.
    Dungeon
    Class representing the Zork dungeon.
    EventHandler
    Class which defines all of the triggerable events in the game.
    Exit
    Class representing an exit for a room.
    FightCommand
    Class representing a 'fight' command to the Zork interpreter.
    HealthCommand
    Class representing a 'health' command to the Zork interpreter.
    HelpCommand
    Class representing an 'help' command to the Zork interpreter.
    Interpreter
    Class which implements the Bork interpreter.
    InventoryCommand
    Class representing an 'inventory' command to the Bork interpreter.
    Item
    Class representing an item in the dungeon.
    ItemSpecificCommand
    Class representing an Item-specific command to the Zork interpreter.
    LightCommand
    Class representing a 'light' command to the Zork interpreter.
    LookCommand
    Class representing a 'look' command to the Zork interpreter.
    MoveCommand
    Class representing a move command to the Zork interpreter.
    PantSuitTroll
    Class which implements the Character played by player's nemesis.
    QuitCommand
    Class representing a 'quit' command to the Zork interpreter.
    Room
    Class which represents a room in the dungeon.
    SaveCommand
    Class representing a 'save' command to the Zork interpreter.
    ScoreCommand
    Class representing an 'score' command to the Zork interpreter.
    StatsCommand
    Class representing an 'stats' command to the Zork interpreter.
    TakeCommand
    Class representing a 'take' command to the Zork interpreter.
    Troll
    Class which implements the trolls in the dungeon.
    UnknownCommand
    Class representing an unknown command to the Zork interpreter.
    Util
    Utility class implementing various static helper methods.
    VerboseCommand
    Class representing an 'verbose' command to the Zork interpreter.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameState
    An enum singleton representing the game's state.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Exit.NoExitException
    Exception class for when there are no exits to read from a dungeon (.bork or.zork) file.
    Item.NoItemException
    Exception class representing when there are no items to read from a dungeon (.bork or .zork) file.
    Room.LockedRoomException
    Exception for attempting to pass into this Room while locked.
    Room.NoRoomException
    Exception class for when there are no rooms to read from a dungeon (.bork or .zork) file.
